title: Nero 8.3.2.1 Ultra Edition + Serials NEW!!!
description:
Nero 8 Ultra Edition, the newest version of the world&#039;s best-selling multimedia 
suite, brings the digital world to your PC. 

Now it&#039;s easy to organize and manage all your multimedia files, as well as create 
and edit new digital content. 

Nero&#039;s sleek design and user-friendly tools make completing projects fun and 
enjoyable.

* NEW User-friendly and intuitive interface
(Nero StartSmart)
* NEW One-click Rip, Burn and Copy functions
* NEW Easy export and share to YouTube, MySpace and My Nero
* High Definition format support
* Stream to Xbox 360 and PlayStation 3
* Backup files to CDs, DVDs, HD DVDs, and Blu-ray Discs
* Optimized for Windows Vista

Installation Notes:
-run installer
-insert serial
-when finished, DO NOT START PROGRAM
-go to Nero Control Center and uncheck automatic updates (at the bottom)
-go to C:/Program Files/Common Files/Nero/Shared/NL3
and delete neropatentactivation.exe and neroupgrade.exe
-enjoy Nero 8 Ultra Edition
